useCase.name: Burn notes to linked ERC20 contract

mainSequence.step: Token Owner creates JoinSplitProof using input notes.
Token Owner encodes proof data using asset address.
Token Owner sends public approval to ACE for withdrawal amount.
Token Owner confidentially transfers proof data and signatures to the asset.
Asset updates the Note Registry with proof data and output.
Registry updates the Note Registry behavior.
Token transfers withdrawal amount to the Token Owner.
